Text: Is the option to play more than one player disabled on this one? Cant get multi player to work, or to honest cant fiend the option=(

It's not Beyblade Metal Fusion Battle Fortress it's
Beyblade Metal Fusion Counter Leone...
Game with French on it!

The Counter Leone is the Europe version of Battle Fortress, which is the US version.

I did not disable anything, just copy it straight from the disc.

Counter Leone is the Europe version.

Metal Fortress is the US version.

Everything should be enabled.
Burned Worked 100% on Neogamma R8 using IMGburn at 4x on generic dvd-r. It booted up as Metal Fusion Battle Fortress For Me..
